lead_paragraph: The Capitals all but clinched the N.H.L.’s best record in the regular season with a 1-0 victory over the Devils on Friday night in Newark.

headline.print_headline: Capitals Top Devils and Move Closer to Presidents’ Trophy
headline.main: Capitals Top Devils and Move Closer to Presidents’ Trophy

snippet: The Capitals all but clinched the N.H.L.’s best record in the regular season with a 1-0 victory over the Devils on Friday night in Newark.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Washington Capitals defeat New Jersey Devils, 1-0; other hockey scores noted.
